product_description: Neosporin + Maximum-Strength Pain Relief Dual Action Antibiotic Ointment from the #1 doctor-recommended brand is a triple antibiotic ointment with pain relief that delivers dependable first aid wound care for minor cuts, scrapes, and burns. Formulated to provide 24-hour infection protection and soothing comfort without sting, it combines the proven infection-fighting power of bacitracin zinc, neomycin sulfate, and polymyxin B sulfate with the topical external analgesic pramoxine hydrochloride for targeted dual-action support. This no-stain ointment applies smoothly without leaving a heavy residue, helping you protect and soothe skin while keeping clothing and bandages clean. The 1-ounce tube is compact for home storage and on-the-go kits and remains a trusted option for everyday first aid use. Introduced in 2007, this reliable triple antibiotic ointment with pain relief reflects brand expertise and long-standing commitment to effective, straightforward wound care. To use, apply a thin layer to the affected area one to three times daily and cover with an adhesive bandage, such as BAND-AID Brand adhesive bandages, to maintain a protective barrier. Its dual action helps reduce discomfort from minor wounds while safeguarding against infection, simplifying your routine by addressing two essential steps in one product. Whether you are restocking a household medicine cabinet, assembling a first aid kit, or preparing for outdoor activities, this topical antibiotic ointment supports everyday readiness and quick response when small mishaps occur. Keep Neosporin + Pain Relief Ointment within reach at home, at work, or while traveling to support comfortable recovery so you can get back to daily activities with less disruption. Suitable for external use on minor wounds only; always follow the directions on the label and refer to the Drug Facts for full ingredient and usage information.
